DESCRIPTION: Play on the go with this ASUS ROG Zephyrus G14 14 gaming laptop. Its ultra-thin profile and lightweight design make it easy to carry, while the built-in Wi-Fi 6 provides high-speed internet connection for lag-free online gaming anywhere. It packs an AMD Ryzen 9 5900HS processor and 16GB of RAM to handle graphically rich software, applications, and games.

Featuring an AMD Ryzen 7 5800H processor, 16GB of DDR4 RAM, and an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 graphics card with 6GB of memory, it packs a powerful punch to run your favorite AAA titles. Its 17.3 Full HD display features a 144Hz refresh rate to present graphic-rich visuals in immersive detail.
